title: Should i buy...
body:
...Kindred {{champion:203}} with real money
Or should i grind ?



Shallowillow

replies.body:
People actually buy champs with RP?

Well shit.

It's actually a sizeable part of Riot's income.

Only champ I ever personally bought with RP was Taliyah.
I will never understand people who spend cash money on things you can earn for free.
